summary: In an age when Machines dominate the world, the fate of man rests in the hands of an outlaw and an android.
cast: Wendy Anderson|Scott Bairstow|Ian Black|Brian Dueck|Mike Fly Fleischhaker|Brian Hlushko|Shannon Jardine|Chris Jericho|Neil Krause|Joey Lawrence|Terrance Leigh|Corey Livingstone|Amy Matysio|Darla Middlebrook|Anne Bedian|Mike O'Brien|Aidan Simpson|Troy Skog|Jodi Stecyk|Ron Webber|Daniel Ford Beavis|Richard Dick|Rob Hoskins
title: La revolución de los Androides
